vehicles.name: Frigate (Age of Sail)
vehicles.desc: Thirty-two guns and the speed to use them. The workhorse of every sailing navy, built for patrol, commerce raiding, and single-ship duels that decided the fate of colonies.
vehicles.notes: The supplement frigate is your ready-to-play age of sail vessel. Drop her into any naval campaign as the player ship or the enemy on the horizon.

vehicles.name: U-Boat (Type VII)
vehicles.desc: The wolf of the Atlantic. She hunts in packs, attacks at night, and turns convoy routes into killing grounds. Cramped, dangerous, and feared by every merchant sailor who crosses the ocean.
vehicles.notes: The supplement U-boat is your ready-to-play submarine threat. She appears, fires, and vanishes. Use her for Battle of the Atlantic scenarios.

vehicles.name: Ancient Trireme
vehicles.desc: Bronze ram, three banks of oars, and the most manoeuvrable warship of the ancient world. She fights by ramming, and every battle is a positioning contest.
vehicles.notes: The supplement trireme is your ready-to-play ancient warship. Ram attacks use collision rules with the bronze ram adding AP.
